word:
C. D. RHODES--I UNDERSTAND, BROTHER EVANS, FROM WHAT HAS BEEN SAID AND READ, THAT THAT TESTIMONY IS CONDEMNING THAT PRINCIPLE THAT WAS BACK YEARS AGO, AND THAT THIS BOARD HAS NOT BEEN ABLE TO SEE ALL RIGHT, AND THEY HAVE FOLLOWED ON, FOLLOWED THE SAME GENERAL PRINCIPLES,--NOT THAT THEY WOULD INTENTIONALLY GO AHEAD AND DO THESE THINGS BUT THEY HAVE NOT SEEN THEM, AND SO THEY 
                                                                           52
HAVE BEEN DOING THE THING UNKNOWINGLY. IS THAT SO, BROTHER JONES?
